summary:
Adds a weapon displaycase to the upper level of Breezehome and a trapdoor which
leads to the new basement.
descriptionHtml:
Dont expect to much from the mods name.Its just a small plugin _downloadsize 14kb_respectivley!
I kept the basement very skyrim lore-friendly.No non-vanilla meshes/textures have been used.
The weapon displaycase in the upper level is bit smaller than normal.Just right for a dagger or 
small sword.
Just a small mod which keeps the snuggly cosiness of breezehome and at the same time adds a bit of \"depth\" to the house.

to install; just unzip the archiv and copy/paste the BreezehomePimped.esp in your Data directory
check the .esp in the launcher,Done!

Hope u have fun with this little plugin.
bye,Ladida
author: ladida
